title: Not getting Hextech chests!
body:
well!! this sounds like a noob. I got 2 Hex tech chests when i reached  lev 5 but now I'm level 10 still i didn't get a single chest ..why?
please help me sort this out.{{champion:22}}
Also i didn't get Kayle as Riot said all the people will get her!!
I have 4 available chests but i can't open it ...why?

replies.body:
first did you get an S with any other champs?
second do you have enough key/ key fragments?
third the gifts are still being distributed, with the 23rd being the final day. If you're absolutely sure you haven't received Riot Kayle by then, I'd suggest making a support ticket.

How to get "S" with a champ?
I don't have keys but i have 4 available chests ...any ideas how to open 'em?
Also,can u tell me who is the best and easy champ by which i can get quadra or penta kills?
Thank you!

There are several requirements to be eligible for receiving a mastery chest, including owning the champion and not already having earned a chest with them.  More details are also available in our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, check it out!

Gifts like Riot Kayle are still being sent out per our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Hang tight until this is all finished rolling out!
